Room.Name: Khelleva Circle
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along the western portion of the Khelleva Circle.
Room.LongDescription: Khelleva Circle continues to the northeast and southeast. To the west, Rosecrest Street branches off along the north side of the Oceancrest Central Arena. On the northwest corner, you can see a large building with a single gem apperently hovering over the building. The gem casts a purple hue over most of the building and some of the adjacent roads.
